verses.verse: <S%G1161>And<s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2430>Iconium<s%>, that <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G1525>went<s%> <S%G846>both<s%> <S%G2596>together<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%>, <S%G5620>that<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> and <S%G2532>also<s%> of the <S%G1672>Greeks<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G544>unbelieving<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> stirred <S%G1892>up<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2559>made<s%> their <S%G5590>minds<s%> evil <S%G2559>affected<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G80>brothers<s%>.

A <S%G2425>long<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> <S%G3767%G99999>therefore<s%> lived <S%G1304>they<s%> <S%G3955>there<s%>, speaking boldly <S%G1909>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, which gave <S%G3140>testimony<s%> unto the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>granted<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5059>wonders<s%> to be <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of the <S%G4172>city<s%> was <S%G4977>divided<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> part <S%G2258>held<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> part <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G3303>apostles<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> there <S%G1096>was<s%> an <S%G3730>assault<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>, and <S%G2532>also<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G758>rulers<s%>, to use them <S%G5195>despitefully<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3036>stone<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>,

They became <S%G4894>aware<s%> of <S%G2703>it<s%>, and fled <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3082>Lystra<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1191>Derbe<s%>, <S%G4172>cities<s%> of <S%G3071>Lycaonia<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> unto the region that lies round <S%G4066>about<s%>:
And <S%G2546>there<s%> they preached the <S%G2258>gospel<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> there <S%G2521>sat<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G3082>Lystra<s%>, <S%G102>impotent<s%> in his <S%G4228>feet<s%>, <S%G5225>being<s%> a <S%G5560>cripple<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%>'s <S%G2836>womb<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G3763>never<s%> had <S%G4043>walked<s%>:

The <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%>: <S%G3739>who<s%> steadfastly <S%G816>beholding<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>perceiving<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> to be <S%G4982>healed<s%>,

<S%G2036>Said<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%>, <S%G450>Stand<s%> <S%G3717>upright<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G242>leaped<s%> up <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4043>walked<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1492>when<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> had <S%G4160>done<s%>, they lifted <S%G1869>up<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5456>voices<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%> in the speech of <S%G3072>Lycaonia<s%>, The <S%G2316>gods<s%> are come <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> in the <S%G3666>likeness<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%>.

<S%G5037>And<s%> they <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%>, <S%G2203>Jupiter<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, <S%G2060>Mercurius<s%>, <S%G1894>because<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> the <S%G2233>chief<s%> <S%G3303>speaker<s%>.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> the <S%G2409>priest<s%> of <S%G2203>Jupiter<s%>, which <S%G5607>was<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%>, <S%G5342>brought<s%> <S%G5022>oxen<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4725>garlands<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> the <S%G4440>gates<s%>, and would <S%G2309>have<s%> done <S%G2380>sacrifice<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%>.

Which <S%G191>when<s%> the <S%G652>apostles<s%>, <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G1284>of<s%>, they tore <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2440>clothes<s%>, and ran <S%G1530>in<s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%>, crying <S%G1161>out<s%>,

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G435>Sirs<s%>, <S%G5101>why<s%> do <S%G4160>you<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>? <S%G2249>We<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> of like <S%G3663>passions<s%> with <S%G5213>you<s%>, and <S%G2097>preach<s%> unto <S%G5209>you<s%> that you should <S%G1994>turn<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G3152>vanities<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> that are in <S%G846>it<s%>:
<S%G3739>Who<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1074>times<s%> <S%G3944>past<s%> <S%G1439>allowed<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> to walk <S%G4198>in<s%> their <S%G846>own<s%> <S%G3598>ways<s%>.

<S%G2544%G99999>Nevertheless<s%> he <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> without <S%G267>witness<s%>, in that he did <S%G15>good<s%>, and <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G5205>rain<s%> from <S%G3771>heaven<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2593>fruitful<s%> <S%G1705>seasons<s%>, filling <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> with <S%G5160>food<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2540>gladness<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> with <S%G5023>these<s%> <S%G3004>sayings<s%> <S%G3433>scarcely<s%> <S%G2664>restrained<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%>, so they <S%G2380>would<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> do a <S%G2380>sacrifice<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1904>there<s%> came certain <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2430>Iconium<s%>, <S%G2532>who<s%> <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%>, having <S%G3034>stoned<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, <S%G4951>drug<s%> him out <S%G1854>of<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%>, <S%G3543>assuming<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> was <S%G2348>dead<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%>, as the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> stood round <S%G2944>about<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, he rose <S%G450>up<s%>, and <S%G1525>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> the next <S%G1887>day<s%> he <S%G1831>departed<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1191>Derbe<s%>.

<S%G5037>And<s%> when they had preached the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> to <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> had <S%G3100>taught<s%> <S%G2425>many<s%>, they returned <S%G5290>again<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3082>Lystra<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G2430>Iconium<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%>,

<S%G1991>Strengthening<s%> the <S%G5590>spirits<s%> of the <S%G3101>disciples<s%>, and exhorting <S%G3870>them<s%> to <S%G1696>continue<s%> in the <S%G4102>faith<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2248>we<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2347>tribulation<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> when they had <S%G5500>ordained<s%> for <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4245>elders<s%> in <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G1577>church<s%>, and had <S%G4336>prayed<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3521>fasting<s%>, they <S%G3908>commended<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> they <S%G4100>believed<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> after they had passed <S%G1330>throughout<s%> <S%G4099>Pisidia<s%>, they <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3828>Pamphylia<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> when they had <S%G2980>preached<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4011>Perga<s%>, they went <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G825>Attalia<s%>:

And <S%G2547>there<s%> <S%G636>sailed<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%>, from <S%G3606>where<s%> they had <S%G2258>been<s%> <S%G3860>committed<s%> to the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> when they had <S%G3854>come<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> had <S%G4863>gathered<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%> <S%G4863>together<s%>, they <S%G312>told<s%> all <S%G3745>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> had <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3754>how<s%> he had <S%G455>opened<s%> the <S%G2374>door<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> unto the <S%G1484>Nations<s%>.
<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> they <S%G1304>lived<s%> a <S%G3641%G99999>long<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%>.
